channel.description: Recent content in Android on Sid Patil

item.title: Supporting adaptive themed icons on Android 13
item.description: One of the coolest features of Android 13 with Material You and Monet is dynamically themed icons. Let us take a look at how we can migrate our apps to Tiramisu and add support for custom themed icons to match the system wide dynamic theme colors.

item.title: Chasing Monet inside the Android framework
item.description: We deep dive into the internals of the Android framework, covering the System-UI to understand the changes introduced starting from Android 12/12L and above, code-named Monet. We will explore the new system-wide dynamic theming capabilities and take a look at how Monet fuels the Material You design.

item.title: Dynamic themes with Compose and Material 3
item.description: Use wallpaper generated system colors from Android 12 and Material You to repaint your apps to the users taste by using the material design 3 library and Jetpack compose

item.title: Better permissions on Android
item.description: Gracefully handle permission denial on Android permission dialogs and leverage permission rational dialogs to enhance the user experience of your application.
